author: Joseph
name: Nightlife-Graphite
description:
Nightlife - avalaible in seven colors

-> Flax: blue borders

-> Graphite: grey borders

-> Honey: yellow borders

-> Human: Ubuntu orange

-> Mint: Linux Mint green

-> Rubine: Debian red

-> Violette: Gentoo purple

 

Features:

- classic 3D panel

- opaque pop-up-menus
